reviews.text: Without doubt this is probably the best buffet style restaurant that I’ve ever eaten in.  The quality and the vast offerings were amazing.  Then they bring out the weapons such as the eye fillet steak, salmon, chips with garlic and parsley as the entree, need I say more.

This is a must if you are visiting Buenos Aires. Top of the line all-you-can-eat cold cuts, excellent meats. We sat outside on the grass overlooking the sea. Waiters are top notch. Prices are around U$S 30 each, which is super low for us visitors.
 As a native Argentinean myself, I know abut Argentinean meat and restaurants. Do not pay attention to locals complaining about prices. Maybe this is not the place for them and some locals love to argue and complain. 
I was at Rodizio Costanera 3 days in a row!!.
I will-of course-be back when I return to Buenos Aires.
Excellent service, awesome meat, and a wonderful river view.
It has a nice view, fair prices, but do not go to their bathroom
